mapper.select: SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM t_warehouse_product_relation WHERE product_id = #{productId}

SELECT wpr.warehouse_id, w.warehouse_name, wpr.product_id, p.product_name, wpr.quantity FROM t_warehouse_product_relation wpr LEFT JOIN t_warehouse w ON wpr.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN t_product p ON wpr.product_id = p.product_id WHERE wpr.product_id = #{productId}
